content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. How much are you willing to pay for the rental price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm interested in your apartment and I'm ready to negotiate a fair price. Let's start with 500 Euro per month. Is that a good starting point for you?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 500 Euro per month is a very reasonable starting point, Yi-Nuo. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, considering the prime location and the modern amenities of the apartment, I was hoping for a slightly higher offer. Can you go up to 550 Euro per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your apartment certainly sounds attractive. I'm willing to consider your request. How about 525 Euro per month? This would be a good balance between your asking price and my initial offer.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 525 Euro per month is a fair compromise, Yi-Nuo. I appreciate your flexibility. Would you be willing to sign a one-year lease with this offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm happy to sign a one-year lease with your current offer of 525 Euro per month. I agree to the price of 525 Euro!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm glad to hear that, Yi-Nuo. A one-year lease with a 525 Euro per month rent is a great arrangement. I look forward to having you as a tenant. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
